rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {D60016, D60017} Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {EDF5942} Otherwise true
For COURSE_CODE IN {D60015} Do Permission required Otherwise true

description: This unit monitors secondary professional experience in the Master of Teaching. Students complete the required number of days and the activities specified in the unit guide. Students' learning is supported by relevant academic staff in the Faculty of Education, and by teacher mentors in the education setting in which they are placed.
